Testimonial

Our Customer Testimonials

FAQ
Questions? Look here
Agapemate is a christian dating app created to assist lonely Christians in discovering fulfilling, Christ-centered relationships. Our platform brings together people who are passionate about faith, values, and achieving their life objectives.
We put safety first by putting strong security measures in place, such as secure chat, profile verification, and the option to report or ban suspected users. Our group is committed to fostering an environment where everyone feels secure and respected.
Yes, we welcome those looking for sincere friendships and lasting connections based on Christian beliefs, as many Agapemate members join the site in hopes of finding a life partner. All believers who want to develop meaningful relationships are welcome to use our platform.
Agapemate provides premium (Diamond and Gold) and free subscription options. Basic functions are free of charge, but a premium (Diamond and Gold) membership offers further advantages including limitless likes, the ability to see who likes you, unrestricted rewinds, five super stars every week, control over who you view, the ability to conceal advertisements, priority likes, and the ability to message before matching.
Our software suggests possible matches based on a blend of personal preferences, common interests, and compatibility based on religion. Using the filters that are important to you, you may also directly search for and connect with members.
Indeed, you can always go to "Settings" by clicking on your profile picture and scrolling down to delete your account. We recognize the value of your privacy and promise to manage your data safely and remove it upon request.
You can email us at support@agapemate.com or use the app to get in touch with our support staff if you have any queries or problems. We are available to assist you!
Agapemate is especially made for Christians looking for deep, spiritually grounded relationships. Based on your filters, our app seeks to connect believers who prioritize spiritual compatibility, common life goals, and a Christ-centered approach to love and relationships.
Make sure your profile is full with a real photo, a thorough bio, and details on your spiritual journey in order to improve your chances. To stand out, participate in our social networking handles and send messages to other users.
Indeed! Agapemate helps you locate someone whose beliefs match yours by allowing you to filter matches based on particular Christian faiths or spiritual practices.
You can report improper activity immediately through the user's profile or get in touch with our support staff if you encounter it. We are dedicated to upholding a polite community and take all reports seriously.
Download the Agapemate app from Google Play (Android) or the App Store (iOS) to create an account. After it's installed, create an account using your phone number, email address, or social media accounts. Then, fill up your profile with information about your beliefs, hobbies, and ideal spouse.
Agapemate does really permit free messaging for its simplest users. However, our Diamond package comes with premium features like priority responses, higher visibility, and unlimited texting.
For the premium (Diamond and Gold) plan, we provide a variety of payment methods, such as PayPal, credit/debit cards, and in-app purchases made through Google Play or the App Store. Throughout the update process, just select the option that works best for you.
Of course! We urge you to extend an invitation to people who share your desire for relationships based on Christ. To unlock unique features within the app, simply share a link with your loved one using the "Invite Friends" tool. You'll receive three stars for free.
